subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: SchemaCrawler allows scripting with database metadata, using Python. This example shows how to script with Python.

ol.li: Install ant, and make sure that ant is on your path
Make sure that java is on your PATH
Start the database server by running the StartDatabaseServer script from the distribution directory
Start a command shell in the python example directory
Run python.cmd (or python.sh on Unix) to use Python integration
Try modifying the Python in the *.py files to do different things. You also have access to a live database connection.
